name: whisperwind
description: a small, easily concealable blade for quick strikes.

name: serpent's kiss
description: a finely crafted dagger with a slightly longer reach.

name: nightshade
description: a dagger imbued with a subtle poison.

name: shadow's fang
description: a dagger crafted from obsidian, incredibly sharp.

name: sparkle
description: a simple wand for channeling basic spells.

name: willow's whisper
description: a beautifully carved wand with increased spell power.

name: dragon's breath
description: a wand made from dragon bone, imbued with arcane power.

name: starfire
description: a rare wand crafted from a fallen star, capable of potent magic.

name: traveler's staff
description: a sturdy wooden staff for basic spellcasting.

name: oakheart
description: a staff carved from an ancient oak tree, imbued with nature's power.

name: shadow's embrace
description: a staff of obsidian, channeling dark energies.

name: archmage's spire
description: a legendary staff said to have belonged to an archmage.

name: beginner's tome
description: a simple book of spells for novice mages.

name: whispers of power
description: a grimoire containing ancient and powerful spells.

name: dragon's codex
description: a grimoire bound in dragon hide, filled with forbidden magic.

name: book of eternity
description: a legendary grimoire said to contain the secrets of the universe.
